name: part_013
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】一番星の推し[あなた]へ届ける⇒ 『LETTER☆彡』【#白上フブキ生誕祭2023】 [7995orE5Enc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs the song "LETTER☆彡" on stage.
A handwritten letter from Fubuki to her fans appears on screen over a shot of the stage.

subtitles.original: 今度は私がエールになりたい
subtitles.english: This time, I want to be the one who cheers you on

subtitles.original: 唄え 全熱量の賛歌
subtitles.english: Sing, an anthem of all my energy

subtitles.original: Dear My Fave,
subtitles.english: Dear My Fave,

subtitles.original: 「大好き！」が溢れた
subtitles.english: My "I love you!" overflowed

subtitles.original: この想い、手紙に書いて贈ります
subtitles.english: I'll write these feelings in a letter and send them to you

subtitles.original: You made my day,
subtitles.english: You made my day,

subtitles.original: 夢を叶えて
subtitles.english: Granting my dreams

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔が、私の原動力
subtitles.english: Your smile is my driving force

subtitles.original: You will always be the first star in my heart
subtitles.english: You will always be the first star in my heart

subtitles.original: どこまでもついてゆくよ！
subtitles.english: I'll follow you anywhere!

subtitles.original: I'm your biggest fan
subtitles.english: I'm your biggest fan

subtitles.original: 「幸せ」って
subtitles.english: "Happiness" is...

subtitles.original: 君と出会って過ごす日々だと定義された！
subtitles.english: defined as the days I spend meeting you!

subtitles.original: 会えない時間だって…良い！
subtitles.english: Even the time we can't meet is... fine!

subtitles.original: 愛を育ててるんです
subtitles.english: Because we're nurturing our love

subtitles.original: どうしたって 叫びたくなった
subtitles.english: No matter what, I wanted to shout

subtitles.original: イタズラ顔も 最の高！
subtitles.english: Even your mischievous face is the best!

subtitles.original: 来世も、再来世までも 語り継ぎたいのです
subtitles.english: I want to pass this down even to the next life, and the one after that

subtitles.original: 一瞬一瞬が
subtitles.english: Every single moment

subtitles.original: ときめくよ
subtitles.english: Is thrilling

subtitles.original: 両手にいっぱいの思い出
subtitles.english: Memories overflowing in my hands

subtitles.original: 確かめ合えば寂しくないから
subtitles.english: If we confirm them with each other, we won't be lonely

subtitles.original: 繋げ 全絆の結晶
subtitles.english: Connect the crystal of all our bonds

subtitles.original: Dear My Fave,
subtitles.english: Dear My Fave,

subtitles.original: 「がんばって！」なんて言えない
subtitles.english: I can't say things like "Do your best!"

subtitles.original: 「大丈夫」の三文字で
subtitles.english: With the three characters for "It's okay"

subtitles.original: 伝わるかな…
subtitles.english: I wonder if it'll get through...

subtitles.original: Day by day
subtitles.english: Day by day

subtitles.original: そう、君のおかげで
subtitles.english: Yes, thanks to you

subtitles.original: 少しだけ 自分を好きになれたから
subtitles.english: I've come to like myself a little more

subtitles.original: 君らしく being and enjoy yourself
subtitles.english: Be true to yourself, being and enjoy yourself

subtitles.original: 心から願う私がいる
subtitles.english: I'm here, wishing from my heart

subtitles.original: ひとりじゃない
subtitles.english: You're not alone

subtitles.original: Dear My Fave,
subtitles.english: Dear My Fave,

subtitles.original: 「大好き！」を集めた
subtitles.english: I gathered all my "I love you!"s

subtitles.original: 合言葉、手紙に書いて贈ります
subtitles.english: I'll write our password in a letter and send it to you

subtitles.original: You made my life 夢で終わらない
subtitles.english: You made my life, it won't end as a dream

subtitles.original: 君だけが 君こそが 起こす奇跡
subtitles.english: Only you, it's you who creates the miracle

subtitles.original: You will always be the first star in my heart☆
subtitles.english: You will always be the first star in my heart☆

subtitles.original: 信じて 夜空のように ずっと
subtitles.english: Believe, like the night sky, forever

subtitles.original: I will follow you forever
subtitles.english: I will follow you forever

subtitles.original: ありったけの愛を込めて
subtitles.english: With all the love I can give

subtitles.original: 「ありがとう」
subtitles.english: "Thank you"

subtitles.original: 君という たった一つの奇跡
subtitles.english: The one and only miracle that is you

subtitles.original: 銀河を超えて 駆け合うフレーズ 輝かせて
subtitles.english: Shining the phrases we call out to each other across the galaxy

subtitles.original: Best wishes,
subtitles.english: Best wishes,

subtitles.original: La-la-la-
subtitles.english: La-la-la-

subtitles.original: 白上フブキ
subtitles.english: Shirakami Fubuki

subtitles.original: coming soon!!
subtitles.english: coming soon!!

subtitles.original: 「大好きな君へ」
subtitles.english: "To my beloved you"

subtitles.original: 今日は私のライブに来てくれて 本当にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming to my live today.

subtitles.original: 今年も君と最高の誕生日を迎えられて 嬉しいよ！！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to be able to celebrate my birthday with you again this year!!

subtitles.original: この活動は君と私の思い出です。
subtitles.english: This journey is the collection of memories of you and me.

subtitles.original: いつまでも、これからも沢山の思い出を 作ってゆこうね。
subtitles.english: Let's keep making many memories forever from now on.

subtitles.original: 全力で出走して応援してくれる君に 負けないくらい私も君を”推して”いくよ！！
subtitles.english: I will "fave" you just as much as you support me with all your heart!!

subtitles.original: 君の推しにしてくれてありがとう！！
subtitles.english: Thank you for making me your fave!!

subtitles.original: 100万回愛してる！！
subtitles.english: I love you a million times over!!

subtitles.original: 君の推しより
subtitles.english: From your fave
